edu.biu.scapi.comm

Interface Channel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticatedChannel, ChannelDecorator, EncryptedChannel, FasterTCPChannel, NativeChannel, PlainChannel, PlainTCPChannel, PlainTCPSocketChannel, SSLSocketChannel

    public interface Channel
    This interface represents a connection between two parties. Once a channel is open and the connection is established it can be used to send and receive messages over it. There are different types of channels and we use the Decorator Design Pattern to implement some of them.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)
